title: Silver
facilites: Option to schedule one consultation session with a dietitian to discuss general dietary guidelines and basic nutritional advice

title: Gold
facilites: All meals included, with expanded options for snacks and beverages.
Premium menu options with seasonal specials
Ability to request customizations to suit dietary preferences or allergies
Two consultation sessions with a dietitian throughout the stay, offering personalized advice and guidance on nutritional needs

title: Platinum
facilites: Exclusive access to personalized menu planning with the chef
Customized dishes tailored to specific tastes and dietary requirements
Unlimited access to a dedicated dietitian for ongoing dietary consultations and personalized meal planning throughout the stay
